author: flare(flare#0001)
install_msg: This cog subclasses core Mod and removed the core mute functionality and replaces it with a timed mute which uses roles. This cog is deprecated and no longer receiving updates. A future update to core will hopefully support timed mutes.
name: Mod
description: Core mod with the inclusion of timed role mutes. This cog is no longer supported. Unload and load core mutes.
